channel.title: Fixed on P.F. Hawkins
channel.description: Recent content in Fixed on P.F. Hawkins

item.title: about
item.description: Patrick Hawkins is a software tester, a writer, husband, and father. He is interested in far too many aspects of putting words and ideas in front of people on the web. Some of what he’s done on the web can be seen at http://patrickhawkins.me.
